title: Merge Duplicate Loyalty Profiles
description: A guest has accidentally created two loyalty profiles and wants to merge them into one.

tasks.description: Identify the two duplicate profiles using the guest's name and email address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully locates both loyalty accounts.

tasks.description: Verify ownership of both accounts with the guest.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the guest is the owner of both profiles.

tasks.description: Merge the two profiles, ensuring all points and stay history are consolidated into the primary account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully merges the accounts and confirms the new total points balance with the guest.
